name: Get Out! (itch) (ClosetedRebis)
description:
Play as Deh'brah, a dragon who simply wishes to be left alone. Hire skeletons, cultists, and elemental anomalies to fend off intruding adventurers who want to steal from your hoard of gold.
There are twenty six waves, each providing a different challenge. Can you last to the end?

This was for a college assignment, so further updates aren't likely to happen.
